title: Astronomics
description: An API-based game, where players establish colonies, build out their settlements, and try to strike it big. Written in Java with Spring. Undergoing a re-write to .NET Core.

title: Nanocart
description: A shopping cart microservice that solely focuses on the cart. Give it a product and user ID, and it'll keep track. Just don't ask it what the product actually is.

title: Project Pinewood
description: A mobile-first website powered by Django, for a entrepreneur and TikTok influencer local to my area.

title: Data Pipeline from Security Tools
description: This one is for my day job, so I can't talk about it too much. It pulls ~100k records per day from various security tools and stores them in a database. It's awesome, you'll have to trust me.
